supportDesc.support: 4.1 X 8.4cm. Fragment torn on all sides with minor scattered holes throughout.

provenance.p: Excavated by Grenfell and Hunt (1903) on behalf of the Egyptian Exploration Fund, and donated to the University Museum in return for its support (1907, Dr. Parrish Collection).
